body.p: Dear Sir after my compliments to you you will please find inclosed my recpt. against the State, Some of my Recepts have been lost, I was ordered from Lexington by Col Moore to Report with my men to him at catlettsburg June 1 ^2^0, 1864 John Morgan had burnd the bridges on the sentril R. R. & i had to to go by way road of Louisvill with my Men
My expenses at Ridiser & Hanover at Frankfort was before I was commisd
if there should bee any other expleanation nessry you will please notify me

N.B. if it should bee all right pay your self for your truble & send a check, I left a Recept with MCapt Sayers for 8,50 which he over looked before its in favor of James Stafford he will add it with the rest
